Name: nep-ahlalhadithcent-la
Author: Ahl Al Hadith Central Society Of Nepal

Translations.Text: (Ibrahimale) bhaneh ki ‘‘he allahaka duta timro abhipraya ke ho?’’
Uniharule bhaneh ki ‘‘hamiharu aparadhi samuhatarpha patha'i'eka haum
Taki uniharumathi kankadi barsa'aum
Jo tapa'iko palanakartako tarphabata nisana laga'i'eka chan ti simako atikramanakariko lagi.’’
Ani tyaham jati imanavalaharu thi'e uniharula'i, hamile nikalihalyaum
Ra hamile tyaham musalamanako e'uta ghara matra bhettayaum
Ra juna manisaharu duhkhad yatanasita dara'umdachan, uniharuko nimti tyaham nisani chodidiyaum
Ra ‘‘musa(alaihis'salama)’’ (ko vrtanta) ma pani (nisani cha) jaba ki hamile unala'i phira'aunatira spasta pramanakasatha pathayaum
Taba tyasale aphno sakti (ghamanda) le vimukha bha'ihalyo ra bhanna thalyo, yo ta jadugara ho va divana
Taba hamile usala'i ra usaka lavalaskarala'i samatihalyaum ra uniharula'i samundrama phyakihalyaum ra tyasako kama nai nindaniya thiyo
Yastai ‘‘ada’’ (ko vrtanta) ma pani (nisani cha), jaba hamile uniharumathi asubha vayu calayaum
Tyo juna juna kuramathi calyo, tyasala'i jirnasirna hada jasto cura–cura garera chadidiyo
Ra ‘‘samuda’’ (ko vrtanta) ma pani (nisani cha) jaba unisita bhaniyo ki eka samayasam'ma pha'ida utha'ihala
Tara uniharule aphno palanakartako adesako ullanghana gare, ani herdaherdai uniharula'i kadaka catyangale samapta garidiyo
Ani uniharu na'uthna sake ra nata badala lina sake
Ra yasabhanda pahila (hamile) ‘‘nuha(alaihis'salama)ko’’ jatibandhula'i pani (samapta garisakeka thiyaum) niscaya nai uniharu thulo avajnakari thi'e
Ra akasala'i hamile aphno saktidvara banayaum ra niscitarupale hamima thulo samathrya cha
Ra dharatila'i hamile bhu'im banayaum tasartha (hera) hamile kati ramrari banayaum
Ra hamile pratyeka kurako joda banayaum taki timile upadesa grahana gara
Atah timi allahatira chitai laga. Niscayanai ma usako tarphabata timro nimti e'uta pratyaksa savadhana garnevala hum
Ra allahako satha an'ya kasaila'i pujya nabana'u. Ma usako tarphabata timro nimti e'uta pratyaksa dara dekha'unevala hum
Yastai yiniharubhanda pahileka manisaharuko pasama juna paigambara a'umthyo uniharule unala'i jadugara va divana bhandathe
Ke yiniharule eka'arkala'i yasa kurako nimti iccha'umdai (upadesa didai) ga'eka chan? (Ho'ina) baru yiniharu sabai avajnakari hun
Tapa'ile yiniharubata panchinus. Tapa'ila'i dosaropana hunechaina
Ra upadesa gardaigarnus kinaki upadesale mominaharula'i labha purya'umcha
Maile jinna ra manisaharula'i yasakarana matra srsti gareko chu taki mero upasana garun
Ma uniharubata jivika cahanna ra na yo cahanchu ki mala'i khuva'un
Allaha aphai jivika pradana garnevala saktisali, drdha cha
Atah jasale atyacara gareka chan uniharuko nimti pani sajayako bhaga nirdharita cha, juna prakara uniharuka sathiharuko nimti nirdharita thiyo. Atah uniharu masita hatara nagarun
Juna dinako yi kaphiraharusita vaca garincha, tyasabata unako nimti kharabi cha
Tura (pahara) ko kasama
Ra kitabako pani jo lekhi'eko cha
Khulla panaharuma
ra abada gharako kasama
Ra ucca chanako (kasama)
Ra bhadka'i'eko samundrako (kasama)
Niscaya nai tapa'iko palanakartako yatana bha'erai rahanecha
Usala'i kasaile rokna saknechaina
Juna dina akasa kampita hunecha
Ra pahadaharu calayamana hunechan
Tyasadina inkara garneharuko nimti purai tiraskara hunecha
Jo satahi jhutha kurama rama'iraheka chan
Juna dina uniharu narkako agotira dhakeli laginechan
Yahi tyo narkako ago ho, jasala'i timile asatya thandathyau
Ta ke yo jadu ho athava timile dekhdainau
yasama pravesa garihala ra dhairya gara va nagara, timro nimti samana cha, juna kama timile garne gardathyau, tyasaiko timila'i pratiphala di'inecha
Jo sanyami chan, uniharu svargama ra anukampaharuma rahanechan
Jejati uniharuko palanakartale uniharula'i pradana gareko cha tyasabata anandita bha'irahanechan, ra unako palanakartale uniharula'i narkako sajayabata baca'ihalyo
Timi aphna karmaharuko pratiphala svarupa, juna timi gardathyau anandasita kha'u ra pi'u
Panktibad'dha bicha'i'eka sanadara takhtaharuma takiya laga'era, ra hamile thula–thula amkha bha'eki sundari (apsara)harusanga uniharuko vivaha garidi'eka chaum

Ra jasale imana lya'e ra unaka santanaharule pani imanama unako anusarana gare, hamile unako santanaharula'i pani uniharusam'ma purya'idinechaum ra unaka karmaharubata kehi kama garne chainaum. Pratyeka vyakti aphno karmajalama phamseko cha
Ra hamile uniharuko lagi svadilo phalaharu ra manapara'eka masu paryapta pradana garnechaum
Tyaham uniharu eka–arkasita pana–patra (madira) adanapradana garnechan, jasama na kunai phajulapana hunecha na kunai papa
Uniharuko asapasama navayuvaka sevakaharu hindirakhnechan jo suraksita motiharu jasto hunechan
Ra eka arkatira dhyana di'era apasama kurakani garnechan
Bhannechanh ki yasabhanda pahila hami aphna gharaharuma (allahasita) dherai dara'une tarsane gardathyaum
Ani allahale hamimathi thulo anukampa garyo ra hamila'i bisalu luko yatanabata baca'ihalyo
Yasabhanda pahila nai hamile usako (allahako) prarthana garne gardathyaum. Nihsandeha u anukampa garnevala dayavan cha
Atah (he paigambara) tapa'i samjha'umdai garnus kinabhane tapa'i aphno palanakartako krpale na sakunavicara garnevala ra nata pagala hunuhuncha
Ke inkara garneharule bhandachanh ki tyo kavi ho jasako nimti hami kalacakra arthata mrtyuko pratiksa garirakheka chaum
Bhanidinus ki timi pratiksa gardaija'u. Ma pani timro sathama pratiksa gardaichu
Ke uniharuko bud'dhile uniharula'i yahi sika'umdacha va uniharu atteri nai hun
Ke inkariharu bhandachan ki yasa paigambarale (kura'anala'i) svayam racihaleko cha? (Ho'ina) samco kura yo cha ki tiniharuma imana chaina
Yadi yiniharu samco chan bhane yasto e'utai vakya yiniharule pani lya'un
Ke yiniharule kasaile srsti nagari aphai janmihaleka hun va svayam srasta hun
ke uniharule nai akasaharu ra dharatiko srsti gareka chan? (Ho'ina) baru yiniharu imana nalya'une manisa hun
Va ke uniharuko pasama timro palanakartako khajana cha? Va uniharu nai tyasako (khajanako) raksaka hun
va ke unako pasama kunai sindhi cha jasamathi cadhera uniharu sundachan? (Yadi yasto cha) bhane uniharumadhye jasale sunirakheko cha usale tyasabarema spasta pramana lya'os
Va ke allahako lagi sabai choriharu chan, ra timra nimti choraharu
va tapa'ile uniharusita kunai parisramika mamgnu huncha jasako bojhale yiniharu thicidai ga'eka chan
ke uniharusanga adrsyako jnana cha ki uniharu tyasala'i lekhihalchan
ke uniharu kunai cala calna cahanchan? (Tara) visvasa garnu kaphira ta svayam da'uko capetama parnevala chan
Ke allaha baheka uniharuko arko kohi pujya cha? (Ho'ina) allaha uniharuko sirkabata pavitra cha
Yadi uniharu akasako kunai tukra khasirakheko dekhchan bhane, bhannechan ki yo ta patramathi patra pareko badala ho
Tasartha uniharula'i chadide'u, yahamsam'ma ki tyo dinako samana hos jasama uniharu behosa parinechan
Juna dina unako kunai da'upeca unako kama a'umdaina ra nata kahimbata sahayata prapta garnechan
Nihsandeha atyacariharuko nimti yasa baheka aru yatana pani cha, tara uniharumadhye adhikansale bujhdainan
Tapa'ile aphno palanakartako adesako pratiksama dhairya garnus, tapa'i ta hamro amkha agadi hunuhuncha. Bihana uthne bela aphno palanakartako prasansako varnana garnus
Ra rati pani usako gunagana garne garnus ra taraharu asta'umda pani
Tarako kasama, jaba tyo tala khascha
Timro sathi (muham'mada) na ta bato birseka chan na bhramita chan
Ra uni aphno icchale kehi bhandainan
Tyo ta matra vahya ho juna (unimathi) patha'imdai cha
Unala'i thulo saktivala allahako duta (jibrila) le sika'eko cha
Tyo saktisali cha ani uni sidha thado bha'ihale
ra uni akasako uccatama bhagama thi'e
Ani uni nikata bha'e ra utari a'e
Aba kamanako bicako duri bamki rahyo va tyobhanda pani kama
Ani allahale aphno dasatira juna ‘‘vahya’ patha'unu thiyo pathayo
Je jati unale dekhe, unako hrdayale tyasala'i jhutha thanena
Ke jejati uni dekhchan timi tyasama unisita vivada garchau
ra (unale) usala'i ekapataka pahile pani dekheka thi'e
Antima simako bairako rukha najika (arthat sidaratul muntaha najika)
Tyasaiko nikatama basasthanavali jannata (jannatul mava) cha
Tyasa bairako rukhala'i dhakeko thiyo je usamathi cha'iraheko thiyo
Unako drsti nata arutira gayo ra na (simabhanda) agadi badhyo
Unale niscaya nai aphno palanakartaka thula–thula nisaniharumadhye kehi dekhe
Ke timiharu lata ra ujjala'i dekhyau
ra tesro antima manata (deviko murti) la'i
ke timro nimti choraharu chan ra allahako nimti choriharu
yo vibhajana ta bedhanga ra an'yayapurna cha

Uniharu ta matra kehi namaharu hun juna timile ra timro ba'ubajele rakheka chan, allahale ta uniharuko nimti kunai pramana patha'eko chaina. Uniharu ta matra adkala ra aphno icchapurtiko pachadi hindirakheka chan ra niscaya nai unako palanakartako tarphabata margadarsana a'isakeko cha
Ke pratyeka manisale juna kurako kamana gardacha, tyo sabai usala'i prapta cha
akhira yasa sansarako ra paralokako svami ta allaha nai ho
Ra akasaharuma yaso dherai pharistaharu chan, ki uniharuko sipharisa kunai kama lagnechaina, yo arkai kura cha ki allaha aphno icchale aphu khusi jasala'i cahancha anumati dincha
Nihsandeha juna manisaharu akhiratamathi imana rakhdainan, uniharule pharistaharula'i striiharuko nama dinchan
Jaba ki uniharula'i yasa visayama kehi thaha chaina. Uniharu ta matra aphno adkalavajiko pachadi hindchan ra anumanale vastavikatako damjoma kehi kama gardaina
Tasartha jo hamro smaranabata vimukha chan ra sansarika jivana baheka aru kehi cahadainan. Tyasabata tapa'i pani vimukha bha'ihalnus

Yasta manisaharuko jnanako pahumca yahimsam'ma cha. Niscaya nai tapa'iko palanakarta tyasala'i ramrosanga jandacha, jo usako margabata vicalita bha'eko cha, ra uhi nai usala'i pani ramrari jandacha jasale (sojho) marga apanayo

Ra je–jati akasaharuma cha ra je–jati dharatima cha sabai allahakai ho, taki jasale naramro karma garyo, uniharula'i tyasako pratiphala de'os. Ra juna manisaharule asala karma gare, uniharula'i ramro pratiphala pradana garos

Juna manisaharu thula–thula papa ra aslila karmaharubata panchinchan, kehi sana–tina papa baheka. Niscaya nai timro palanakarta ksamasilatama bado vyapaka cha. Usale timila'i ramrari jandacha, jaba usale timila'i matobata srsti garyo ra jaba timi aphna amaharuko petama bhruna avasthama thiyau. Tasartha aphno manako pavitratako davi aphai nagara. Usale sanyamiharula'i ramrari jandacha
Ke tapa'ile tyasa vyaktila'i dekhanu bhayo jo vimukha bhayo
Ra alikati diyo, ra kathora bha'ihalyo (hata rokyo)
Ke usala'i paroksako jnana cha ki usale sabathoka dekhirakheko cha
va juna kuro ‘‘musako’’ kitabama chan, uniharula'i tyasako barema thaha bha'ena
ra juna vaphadara ibrahimako kitabama thiyo
ki kunai pani vyaktile aru vyakti (ko papa) ko bhari boknechaina
Ra yo ki pratyeka manisako lagi tyahi nai ho jasako nimti usale prayasa garyo
Ra yo ki usako prayasa sighra nai dekhinecha
Ani usala'i pura pratiphala pradana garinecha
Ra yo ki tapa'iko palanakartakai pasama pugnu cha
Ra yo ki usaile hasa'umcha ra rula'umcha
Ra yo ki usaile mardacha ra jivita rakhdacha
Ra yo ki usaile stri ra purusa (bhale ra pothi) jodiko srsti garyo
(Viryako) thopabata jabaki tyo garbhama tapaka'incha
Ra yo ki (kayamatako dina) usaiko jim'ma punah utha'unu cha
Ra yo ki uhi ho jasale ki dhani ra santusta bana'umcha
Ra yo ki uhi se'ara (arabaharuka pahilako pujya tara)ko svami ho
Ra yo ki usaile pracina adala'i nasta garyo
Ra samudala'i pani, arthata kasaila'i bamki chadena
Ra yinibhanda pahila ‘‘nuhako’’ kaumala'i pani. Kunai sandeha chaina ki uniharu bado atyacari ra bado atteri thi'e
Ra paltijane bastila'i usaile nasta garidiyo
Ani tyasala'i chopihalyo, jasala'i juna kurale chopnu thiyo
Ani (he manisa) timile aphno palanakartaka kuna–kuna anukampako visayama vivada garnechau
yi (muham'mada sallallaho alaihe vasallama) pani pahileka savadhanakartaharu jastai e'uta savadhana garnevala hun
A'unevala (kayamata) najika a'ipugyo
Tyasa dinako lukeka kurala'i allaha baheka kasaile prakata garnasakne chaina
Aba ke timile yasa kurama ascarya gardachau
ra hamsdachau? Ra rumdainau
apitu timi khelirakheka chau
Tasartha allahako agadi dhoga ra usaiko upasana gara
Kayamata najika a'ipugyo ra candra cyatiyo
Ra yadi kaphiraharule kunai camatkara dekhdachan bhane mukha pharka'ihalchan ra bhanchan ki yo pahiladekhi cali'a'iraheko e'uta jadu ho
Uniharule asatya thahara'e, ra aphna icchaharu anusara gare. Ra pratyeka kamako samaya nirdharita cha
Ra niscitarupale uniharuche'u (atitaka) yasta sucanaharu pugisakeka chan, jasama hapkidapki ra nasihatako kura cha
Atah purna bud'dhimattako kura pani cha, kintu cetavaniharu uniharuko kunai kama a'iraheko chaina
Atah he nabi tapa'i uniharubata vimukha bha'ihalnus, juna dina pukarnevala eka atyanta apriya kuratira bola'une cha
Taba uniharu jhukeka aphna amkhaharuka satha, cihanabata yasari niskiraheka hunchan, jastoki uniharu chari'eka salahaharu hun
Tyasa bola'unevalatira dagurdai ga'irakheka hunechan. Inkara garneharu bhanne chan ki yo dina bado kathina cha
Yiniharubhanda pahila ‘’nuhako’’ jatibandhule pani hamro bhaktala'i asatya thahara'eka thi'e. Ra baulaha bhanera hapka'eka thi'e
Taba unale aphno palanakartasamga prarthana gare ki ma vivasa chu, tasartha mero maddata gara
Taba hamile musaladhare paniko varsabata akasako muhana kholidiyaum
Ra dharatima panika mulaharu pravahita garidiyaum ra sara pani tyasa kamako nimti ekatrita bha'ihalyo juna nirdharita bhaisakeko thiyo
Ra hamile ‘‘nuhala'i’’ e'uta dungama jo takhta ra killaharubata tayara gari'eko thiyo, savara gara'ihalyaum
Tyo hamro amkhako agadi caliraheko thiyo, yo badala usako tarphabata thiyo, jasala'i inkara gari'eko thiyo
Ra hamile yasa ghatanala'i e'uta nisani bana'era bamki rakhyaum, ta kohi cha jasale upadesa hasila (prapta) garos
Bhana mero sajaya ra dara'une kura kasto rahyo
ra hamile kura'anala'i bujhnako nimti sarala garidiyaum, ta kohi cha jasale upadesa hasila garos
‘‘adako samudayale’’ pani jhutha thahara'e tara mero yatana ra mero darako kura kasto rahyo
hamile uniharutira e'uta asubha dinama nirantara teja bagne pracanda amdhi (huri) calayaum
Tyasale manisaharula'i ukheli'eko khajurako bota jastai utha'umdai phyamkdai gareko thiyo
Ta mero yatana ra tarsa'i kasto rahyo
niscitarupale hamile kura'anala'i upadesako lagi sajilo paridi'eka chaum, ta kohi cha jasale upadesa li'ihalos
‘‘samudako samudayale’’ pani cetavani dinevalaharula'i asatya thahara'e
Ra bhane ki ke hamile hamiharumadhyekai e'uta mancheko anusarana garaum ? Tyasto bha'eta hami niscitarupale margavicalana ra baulahapanama parihalne chaum
Ke hami sabaimadhye usaimathi vahya (allahako vani) avatarita bha'eko ho? Ho'ina baru tyo atyanta jhutha, atmaprasansaka ho
Uni sabaila'i aba cadai thaha bhaihalnecha ki ko jhutha ra atmaprasansaka thiyo
Nihsandeha hamile unako pariksako nimti umtani patha'une chaum, tasartha (he saleha) timi unako pratiksa ra dhairya gara
Ho uniharula'i sucita garide'u ki pani uniharubica bamdi saki'eko cha. Pratyeka vyakti aphno paloma a'unu parnecha
Uniharule aphno sathila'i damke, jasale (umtanimathi) prahara garyo ra usako ghumdako pachadiko nasa katidiyo
Tasartha mero yatana ra tarsa'i kasto rahyo
hami uniharumathi e'uta citkara (visphota) pathayaum, ani uniharu yasto bhaihale jasto khetiko ali bana'umda madari'eko ghamsaharu
Ra hamile kura'anala'i upadesako nimti sarala garidiyaum, ta kohi cha jasale upadesa li'ihalos
‘‘lutako’’ kauma (jatibandhu) le pani dara'uneharula'i jhutha bhane
Taba hamile uniharumathi gittile bhari'eko hava calayaum, tara ‘‘lutaka’’ parivara baheka tiniharula'i hamile pratahkala nai baca'ihalyaum
Hami yastai prakarale tyasa vyaktila'i aphno anukampabata pratiphala dinchaum jasale krtajnata dekha'umcha
Ra (lutale) uniharula'i hamro pakadabata dara'eka pani thi'e tara tiniharule tyasama sanka gardairahe
Uniharule luta (alaihis'salama)la'i phaka'era usako pasabata usako atithiharula'i bola'una cahe, taba hamile unako amkhala'i andha bana'idiyaum, tasartha (aba) mero yatana ra mero darako svada cakha
Ra satya kuro cha unila'i bihanai e'uta atala nirdharita yatanale nasta garidiyo
Ta aba mero sajaya ra mero darako svada cakha
Ra hamile kura'anala'i upadesako nimti sarala bana'idi'eka chaum ta kohi cha jasale siksa prapta garos
Ra phira'aunaka manisaharuko pasa pani dara'unevala a'e
Uniharule hamra sabai nisaniharula'i asatya thahara'e. Antatah hamile uniharula'i samatihalyaum, juna prakarale e'uta jabarajasta adhipatyasalile samatcha
(He kuraisiharu) ke timra kaphiraharu ti kaphiraharubhanda ramra chan? Va pahilaka granthaharuma (timro nimti kunai) chutkara lekhi'eko cha
ke yiniharu bhanchanh ki hamro jat'tha vijaya hunevala bado baliyo cha
sighra nai yo jat'tha parajita hunecha ra yiniharu pithyum pharka'i bhagihalnechan
Uniharusangako vacana anusara kayamatako samaya (a'une) cha ra kayamata (pralaya) bado gahro ra bahuta kathora kura ho
Nihsandeha papiharu margabicalana ra yatanama pareka chan
Junadina uniharula'i mukha tala parera narkako agoma ghisarinecha. (Ra uniharusanga bhaninecha) aba, agoko svada cakha
Niscaya nai hamile hareka kurala'i nirdharita napa ra anumanama srsti gareka chaum
Ra hamro adesa eka pataka matra (ekachinako lagi huncha) jasto ki amkhako jhimka'i
Ra hamile timi jasta manisala'i vinasta garisakeka chaum, ta kohi cha jo upadesa prapta garihalos
Ra je–jati uniharule gareka chan, tyo karmapatrama ankita cha
(Arthat) pratyeka sano ra thulo kura lekhi'eko cha
Niscaya nai jo sanyami parahejagara chan, uniharu baga ra naharaharuko majhama hunechan
(Arthat) pavitra sthanama adhipatyasali samratako nikata ramrosamga sam'manaka satha
Rahamana (allaha) le
kura'ana sikayo
Usaile manisaharula'i srsti garyo
ra usala'i bolna sikayo
Surya ra candra eka nirdharita hisabale calirakheka chan
ra tara ra vrksa dubaile dhogi rakheka chan
Ra usaile akasala'i mathi uthayo ra tula (taraju) sthapita garyo
Taki timi taulda simako ullanghana (ghatibadhi) nagara
N'yayocitarupale thika taula gara ra taulama kama nade'u
Ra usaile praniharuko nimti dharati bicha'idiyo
Tyasama svadista phala ra gucchavala khajuraka rukhaharu chan
Ra bhusavala annaka dana chan ra sugandhita phalaharu pani chan
Tasartha (he manisa ra jinna) timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kanu anukampala'i asatya thahara'umnechau
usale manusyala'i kanakrita jasta khanakhana'umdo matobata srsti garyo
Ra jinnala'i usale agoko rapabata srsti garyo
Tasartha timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya sabita garnechau
U du'i purvako svami ho ra du'i pascimako pani
Ani (he jinna ra manava) timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampaharula'i asatya thahara'unechau
usaile du'i samundra pravahita garidiyo jo apasama milchan
Ti duvaiko bicama e'uta parda cha. Jasako tiniharu atikramana gardainan
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
ti duvai samundrabata moti ra mumga niskancha
Atah timile aphno palanakartaka kuna–kuna puraskaraharula'i jhutha bhannechaum
ra ti jahajaharu pani usaika hun jo samundrama parvataharu jhai aglo bha'i calirakheka chan
Tasartha timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
pratyeka prani jo yasa dharatima cha, nasavana cha
Tara timro palanakartako anuhara (vyaktitva) jo pratisthita ra sam'manita cha sesa rahanevala cha
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna– kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
akasaharu ra dharatima jo kohi pani chan sabai usaisita mamgdachan, pratyeka dina u naulo sanama cha
Ani timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
he duvai samudayaharu (jinna ra manusya) hami sighra timro nimti purnarupale dhyana dinechaum
Ani timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
he jinna ra manusyaka samudayaharu yadi timiharuma akasaharu ra dharatika simaharula'i para garne sakti cha ta niskera hera tara bina varcasvata ra saktiko timile kahilyai para garna sakdainaum
Ani timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
timimathi agoko jvala ra dhuvam chodine cha, ani timile mukabila garna sakdainau
Ani timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
ani jaba akasa cyati'era rato chala jasto bha'ihalnecha
Ani timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
ani tyasadina na kunai manisasita usako papako barema sodhinecha ra na kunai jinnasita
Ani timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
gunahagaraharu aphno anuharabata nai cininechan, ra unaka ta'ukoko kapalaharu ra khuttadvara uniharula'i samatine cha
Atah timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
yahi tyo jahannama ho, jasala'i gunahagaraharule asatya bhandathe
Uniharu yasako ra umlirakhakeko tato paniko bicama cakkara laga'irahanechan
Tasartha timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'unechau
Ra juna manisa aphno palanakartako samu ubhinubata dara man'yo, usako nimti du'ivata svargaharu chan
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna– kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'unechau
ti duvai svargaharuma dherai hamgaharu hunechan
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna– kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'unechau
yi duvai bagaincaharuma du'ita pravahita jharanaharu chan
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna– kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'unechau
ti duvai bagaincaharuma pratyeka svadista phalaka du'i–du'i kisima hunechan
Atah timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
svargama rahaneharu yasta ochyanama takiya laga'era baseka hunechan, jasako astara baklo resamaka hunechan, ra duvai bagaincaka phalaharu najikai hunechan
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
tyaham amkha jhuka'eka lajjalu striharu (apsara) hunechin, jasala'i jannatavalabhanda pahila na kunai manisale sparsa gareko huncha ra na kunai jinnale
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
ti (apsara) striharu yakuta ra mumga jasti hunechin
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
bhala'iko badala bhala'i baheka aru ke hunecha
ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
ra yi bagaincaharu baheka du'ivata aru bagaincaharu chan
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
duvai nikai gadha hariya chan
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
ti duvai bagaincaharuma du'ivata bagne jharanaharu pravahita bha'irakheka chan
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
yiniharuma svadista phala, mevaharu khajura ra anaraharu hunechan
Atah timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
Yiniharuma caritravana ra sundara striharu chin
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
goro ranga bha'eki ti striharu svargaka khimaharuma rahanevali hun
Ta timile (he manava ra jinna) aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
jasala'i pahila na kunai manusyale cho'eko huncha ra na kunai jinnale
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
uniharu hariya resami dasana ra utkrsta ra asadharana galaincaharuma takiya laga'era baseka hunechan
Ta timile aphno palanakartako kuna–kuna anukampala'i asatya thahara'une chau
thulai barakatavala nama ho timro garimamaya ra udara palanakartako
Jaba kayamata ghatita bha'ihalne cha
Tyasako ghatita hune kurama kehi asatya chaina
Kasaila'i tala jharne, kasaila'i mathi ucalne hunecha
Jaba dharati bhukampako satha kampita gara'inecha
Ra pahadaharu phutalera sana–sana kanama parinata gara'inechan
Ani tiniharu dhulo jasto bha'i udna thalnechan
Ra timiharu tina samuhama parinata hunechau
Ta dahina hatavala, dahina hatavala kasto saubhagyasali chan
Ra bamya hatavala aphasoca bamya hatavalako kasto halata cha
Ra jo agadivala chan uniharu ta agadivala nai hun
Tiniharu bilkula (allahako) samipyata prapta hun
Anukampale bhari'eko jannatama chan
Dherai thulo samuha ta aghika manisaharuko hunecha
Ra thorai pachikaharumadhyebata
Yiniharu sunaka taraharule baneka palangaharumathi
Eka arkako samunne takiya laga'era baseka hunechan
Unako pasama kisoraharu jo sadhaim (balaka nai rahanechan) a'undaijandai garnechan
Arthat pyala ra jagama svadilo peyale bhari'eko patra li'era hindirahane chan
Jasabata na ta ta'ukoma darda hunecha ra na unako bud'dhima vikara a'unecha
Ra tyasta phalaharuko satha juna ki unale ruca'umchan
Ra panksika masu juna tiniharule ruca'umchan
Ra thula–thula amkha bha'eki (apsara) haru
jo lukeko moti jasti hunechin
Yo uniharuko karmako pratiphala ho
Tyaham na vyarthaka kura sunnechan ra na gunahaka
Uniharuko apasama salamako adana–pradana matra hunecha
Ra dahina hatavalaharu nikai (bhagyasali) hunechan
Uni kamda nabha'eka bayaraharu
ra gucchedara keraharu
ra parasam'ma phaili'eka chamyaharu
ra panika jharanaharu
ra prasasta phalaharuma (hunechan)
juna kahilyai samapta hune chainan ra unibata kasaile roknechaina
Ra agla, agla ochyanama hunechan
Hamile uniharuka svasniharula'i visesa prakarale srsti gareka chaum
Ani uniharula'i hamile kumari (pavitra) banayaum
Samana umeraki ra mayalu
Dahine hatavalaharuko nimti hun
Yiniharuma aghillamadhyeka pani dherai hunechan
Ra pachillamadhyeka pani dherai hunechan
ra bamya hatavalaharu, (aphasoca) bamya hatavala kasta chan
Garma (tato) hava ra umlirakheko panima hunechan
Ra kalo dhuvamko chamyama
juna na ciso cha na ruca'une yogya
Nihsandeha uniharu yasabhanda pahila dherai sukha suvidhama thi'e
Ra thula–thula papaharu gardai baseka thi'e
ra bhanne gardathe ki ke jaba hami mrta bha'ihalne chaum ra mato ra hada bha'ihalne chaum, hami pheri utha'ine chaum
ra ke hamra babu baje pani
tapa'i bhanidinus ki nihsandeha pahila ra pachika
Sabai e'uta nirdharita dinako samayama avasya ekatrita garinechan
Ani timi he asatya thahara'unevala patha vicalitaharu
thuhara (kyaktasa) ko vrksa khanechau
Ra yasaile peta bharne chau
ra yasamathi umlirakheko pani pi'unechau
ra pi'umda pani (yasaprakara pi'unechaum jasto ki) tirkha'eko umta jasto
kayamatako dina uniharuko satkara ho yo
hamile timi sabaila'i srsti gareka haum, tasartha timile kina (satya) mandainau
hera juna timile virya (svasnima) chadchau
ke timile tyasabata manisako srsti gardachau va hamile nai srsti gardachaum
hamile nai timima mrtyu nirdharita garidi'eka chaum ra hami tyasabata hareka ho'inaum
Ki hamile timro tha'umma aru timiharu jastala'i paida garna sakchau ra timila'i nayam rupama tyasa sansarama paida garidinchaum jasako barema timalia'i thaha chaina
Timila'i pahilo patakako janma thaha cha, ani timile kina siksa grahana gardainau
ani yo pani bata'u juna timile ubja'umchau
ke timile nai tyasala'i ubja'uchaum va hami ubja'unevala haum
yadi hamile cahyaum bhane tyasala'i bhusa garidinchaum ra timi kura gardai rahanechau
(Ki aphasoca) hami ta sittaima dandama parihalyaum
baru hami bilkulai vancita rahayaum
Ani yo bata'u timile juna panila'i pi'umchau
Usala'i badalabata pani timile nai barsa'eka hau va hamile barsa'umchaum
yadi hamile cahyaum bhane tyasa panila'i khara bana'idinchaum? Ani timile krtajnata kina prakata gardainau
hera yo pani bata'u ki juna ago timile salka'umchau
(ke timile) tyasa rukhala'i srsti gardachau va hamile tyasako srsti gareka chaum
Hamile usala'i e'uta upadesako madhyama ra yatriharu (ra avasyaka parneharuka) lagi labhaprada bana'eka chaum
Atah timile aphno mahan palanakartako gunagana gara
Ma khasne taraharuko kasama khanchu
Ra yadi timile bujhchau bhane yo thulo kasama ho
niscaya nai yo dherai pratisthita kura'ana ho
jo e'uta suraksita kitabama ankita cha
Tyasala'i pavitra (pharistaharu) matra hata laga'umchan
Sampurna sansarako svamiko tarphabata avatarita gari'eko cha
Ke timile tyasa vanila'i sadharana thanchau
ra aphno bhagama yo linchau ki yasala'i jhutho thahara'umdai gara
ani jaba prana kanthama a'ipugdacha
ra timile tyasa samaya akhamle herirakheko hunchau
ra hami tyasa bela timibhanda dherai najika hunchaum tara timile dekhdainau
Atah yadi timi kasaiko adhinama chainau
Ra yasa kurama yadi samco hau, ta yasa pranala'i kina pharka'umdainau
ani yadi kohi (allahako) darabarako najika gari'eko hunecha
Bhane usako nimti arama, sukhasamagri ra aramadayaka svargaharu chan
Ra jo dahine hatavalamadhyeko cha
timila'i salama cha ki timi bhagyasalimadhyeka chau
Tara yadi kohi tyo jhutha thahara'une ra margabicalitaharumadhyeko cha
ta usako lagi umlirakheko paniko atithya cha
ra (pheri) narkama janu cha
Nihsandeha yo (khabara) purai satya ho
Atah timile aphno mahan palanakartako gunagana garirakha
Akasaharu ra dharatima je cha sabaile allahakai gunagana gardaichan ra u adhipatyasali thulo tatvadarsi cha
Akasaharu ra dharatiko satta usaiko ho, usaile jivana dincha ra mrtyu pani ra u pratyeka kurama samathrya sampanna cha
Uhi pahila ho ra antima pani. Vyakta ho ra avyakta pani. Ra u hareka kura ramrari jandacha

Uhi ho jasale akasaharu ra prthvila'i chah (6) dinama srsti garyo ani sinhasanamathi ucca bhayo. U jandacha je jati dharatima pravesa gardacha ra je–jati usabata niskancha, ra je–jati akasabata avatarita huncha ra je–jati usama cadhdacha. Ra timi jahamsukai bha'e pani u timro sathama cha ra allaha dekhdacha, je–jati timile gardachau
Akasaharu ra dharatiko satta usaiko ho ra allahatira nai sabai kura pharka'inchan
Usaile ratala'i dinama pravista gara'umdacha ra dinala'i ratama pravista gara'umdacha. U chatima lukeka kuraharu pani jandacha

(Tasartha) allaha ra usako rasulamathi imana lya'u ra juna malasamanama usale timila'i aruharuko uttaradhikari bana'eko cha tyasamadhyebata kharca gara. Ta timiharumadhye jasale imana lya'e ra kharca (dana) garirahe uniharuko nimti thulo pratiphala cha

Timiharu allahamathi imana kina lya'umdainau, jaba ki paigambaraharule timila'i timro raba (pratipalaka) mathi imana lya'una amantrana garirakheka chan. Ra yadi timi imanavala hau bhane usale timisita drdha vacana pani li'isakeko cha

Uhi allaha ho jasale aphno bhaktaharumathi spasta ayataharu utarirakheko cha taki usale timila'i andhakaraharubata prakasatira lya'os. Vastavikata yo cha ki allaha timimathi atyanta karunamaya ra dayavana cha

Timila'i ke bha'eko cha ki allahako batoma kharca gardainau? Jaba ki akasaharu ra jaminako svamitva allahakai nimti cha, timiharumadhye juna vyaktile (makkako) vijayabhanda pahila kharca garyo ra lada'i garyo uniharu aruko samana huna sakdainan. Uniharuko darja ti manisaharubhanda badhi cha, jasale pachi kharca gare ra dharma yud'dha gare. Ho allahale sabaila'i bhala'iko vacana ta di'eko cha ra juna kama timile gardachau allaha tyasala'i jandacha
Ko cha jasale allahala'i ramro rna de'os, ki usale tyasala'i usako nimti dherai guna badha'umdai garun. Ra usako nimti sam'manita pratiphala cha

Kayamatako dina timile momina purusaharula'i ra momina striharula'i unako prakasa uniharuko agadi agadi ra dayamtira hindirakheko dekhnechau. (Unisita bhanine cha ki) timila'i subhasamacara cha aja timro nimti yasta bagaincaharuko, jasaka dharatalama naharaharu bagirakheka chan, tiniharuma sadainva rahanechaum yahi thulo saphalata ho

Tyasadina kapati purusa ra striharu mominaharusita bhannechan ki hamro pratiksa ta gara ki hamile pani timro prakasabata kehi prakasa hasila garaum ta uniharusita bhanine cha ki timi pachadi pharkera ja'u, (tyaham) aru prakasa khoja, ani uniharuko bicama e'uta parkhala ubhya'ine cha, jasama dhoka pani hunecha usako bhitri bhagama (allahako) krpa hunecha ra bahira sajaya hunecha

Yiniharule (kapatacariharule mominaharusita) kara'era bhannechan ki ke hami timro sathama thi'enaum, uniharule bhannechan kina thi'enau, tara timile svayam aphule nai aphula'i vicalanama paryau ra pratiksa garirakhyau ra sandehama parirahyau ra timra vyarthaka kamanaharule timila'i dhokama rakhe, yahamsam'ma ki allahako phaisala a'ihalyo ra timila'i allahako barema dhoka dinele dhokamai rakhirakhyo
Tasartha aja nata timibata kunai phidiya (badala) svikara garinecha ra na kaphiraharubata. Timi sabaiko thegana narka ho tyo nai timiharuko sathi ho ra tyo naramro thegana ho

Ke mominaharuko nimti ahile pani yasto samaya a'eko chaina ki uniharuka hrdaya allahako lagi ra juna satya avatarita bhayo tyasako lagi narma (komala) hos? Ra uniharu jasta nabha'ihalos jasala'i unibhanda agadi kitaba pradana gareko thiyo. Ani tyasa pascata lamo kalakhanda bityo. Ani uniharuka hrdaya kathora bha'ihale ra uniharumadhye adhikansa avajnakari chan
Janirakha ki allaha nai dharatila'i usako mrtyu pascata jivana pradana gardacha. Hamile timro nimti hamra ayataharula'i spastarupale varnana garidi'eka chaum, taki timi bujha
Nihsandeha khairata (dana) garnevala, purusaharu ra striharu ra jasale allahala'i ramro rna dinchan, tyasala'i unako nimti kaiyaum guna pradana garinecha ra uniharuko nimti sam'manita pratiphala cha

Ra juna manisaharu allaha ra usaka paigambaraharumathi imana lya'e uniharu aphno palanakartako samipama samco ra sahida chan. Uniharuko nimti uniharuko pratiphala ra prakasa cha ra jasale kuphra gare ra hamra ayataharula'i asatya thahara'e tiniharu narkiya hun

Janirakha ki sansarako jivana e'uta khela ra tamasa ra sajavata ho ra timro apasama eka arkamathi ghamanda darsa'une ra matra dhana ra santanako kurama paraspara eka arkabhanda badhi bha'eko pradarsita garnu ho. Jasto varsa ra tyasadvara ubjani kisanala'i ramro lagdacha. Ani tyo jaba pakihalcha, ani timile dekhchau ki pahenlo bha'ihalyo. Ani tyasapachi tyo cura–cura bha'ihalcha. Ra kayamatama kathora yatana pani cha ra allahako ksama ra prasannata pani cha. Ra sansarika jivana ta matra dhokako sukhasamagri baheka kehi ho'ina

(A'u) aphno palanakartako ksama ra tyasa svargatira agrasara ho'u jasako akara akasa ra dharati barabara cha, juna ti manisaharuko nimti tayara gari'eko cha jasale allaha ra usaka rasulaharumathi imana rakhdachan. Yo allahako udara anugraha ho, jasala'i cahancha pradana garcha. Ra allaha dherai udara thulo anugrahako svami ho
Junasukai musibata (duhkha sankata) dharatima a'umcha ya timimathi tyasala'i maile patha'unubhanda pahila e'uta kitabama ankita huncha. Yo kama allahako nimti sajilo cha

Taki timile tyasakurabata aphasoca nagara juna ki timibata gujrisakeko cha, ra na tyasa kuramathi abhimana gara juna usale timila'i pradana gareko cha. Allahala'i kunai ghamandi ra atmaprasansakaharu mana para'umdainan
Jo svayam kanjusi gardachan ra aruharula'i pani kanjusi garna prerita gardachan ra (sunirakha) jo kohi pani vimukha hos, allaha ta nisprha prasansaniya cha

Niscaya nai hamile aphna paigambaraharula'i spasta nisaniharu di'era pathayaum ra uniharumathi kitaba ra tula avatarita garyaum taki manisaharu n'yayama drdha rahun ra phalama pani utaryaum. Tyasama thulo khatara cha ra nikai baliyo cha ra manisaharuka lagi aru pani pha'idaharu chan, ra yasa karana pani ki allaha thaha pa'ihalos ki ko paroksama rahamdai usako ra usaka rasulaharuko sahayata gardacha. Niscaya nai allaha saktisali ra adhipatyasali cha

Ra hamile ‘‘nuha’’ ra ‘‘ibrahimala'i’’ sandesta bana'era pathayaum ra uniharuko santatima paigambari ra kitabala'i (allaha bata avatarita hune) jari rakhyaum ani uniharumadhye kehi ta satmarga apana'e, kintu uniharumadhye dherai ta avajnakari nai rahe

Ani uniharupachi pani hamile ekapachi arko rasula patha'umdai garyaum ra unipachi ‘‘mariyamako’’ chora ‘‘isala'i’’ pathayaum ra unala'i ‘‘injila’’ pradana garyaum ra unako anusarana garneharuko hrdayama hamile karuna ra daya srjana garyaum. Rahyo san'yasako kura ta uniharule svayam bana'eka thi'e hamile tyasala'i uniharuko nimti anivarya gareka thi'enaum yadi anivarya gareka thiyaum ta kevala allahako prasannatako cahana. Ani uniharule tyasako nirvaha garna sakenan. Atah ti manisaharula'i jo tiniharumadhye imana lya'eka thi'e, uniharula'i unako pratiphala hamile pradana garyaum. Tara uniharumadhye dherai avajnakari nai chan

He mominaharu! Allahasita dara ra usako rasulaharumathi imana lya'u. Allahale timila'i aphno dayako du'iguna bhaga pradana garnecha ra timro nimti e'uta prakasa dinecha, jasako prakasama timi hindnechau ra timro papa pani ksama garidinecha. Allaha bado ksamasila ra atyanta dayavana cha

Yo yasakarana ki kitaba manneharule janihalun ki uniharula'i allahako anugrahako kunai bhagamathi kehi pani adhikara prapta chaina ra yo ki sampurna anugraha allahakai hatama cha, jasala'i cahancha, pradana gardacha ra allaha thulo anugrahako svami cha
